body_html: I got similar problems earlier and solved it by removing nccl from LD_LIBRARY_PATH. I'm not sure what's going on, but it seems to be conflicting with the NCCL version that TF was compiled with. Also, certain versions of cudnn can also give NaN.
body_text: I got similar problems earlier and solved it by removing nccl from LD_LIBRARY_PATH. I'm not sure what's going on, but it seems to be conflicting with the NCCL version that TF was compiled with. Also, certain versions of cudnn can also give NaN.
body: I got similar problems earlier and solved it by removing nccl from `LD_LIBRARY_PATH`. I'm not sure what's going on, but it seems to be conflicting with the NCCL version that TF was compiled with. Also, certain versions of cudnn can also give NaN.
